originalText.text: Let me try to be as concise as possible. They came to fix our HVAC unit. It broke down again in a week. They came another time to fix it again only for it to fail again. They said they completed the job so they should get paid and clearly they did not as the unit never properly worked. In fact, I had to call another company to come to properly fix the unit. They were also very unresponsive. All around this has been a tough and costly experience which is not what I needed in this economic climate. I should've read the reviews prior too engaging with them. Proceed with caution if you do but I would recommend staying away. I tried my best to be concise.

originalText.text: Complete shill of a company. They do terrible work and don't show up to job sites for weeks. All of their work is done poorly and you must make them redo it, and they will complain the entire way through. When you try to get a hold of them to figure out why workers aren't on site, no one calls you back ever. Completely terrible to do business with and would rather use box fans than utilize their services again. The only reason they are still around is because they bribe property managers for jobs. STAY AWAY!!!!

originalText.text: Absolutely terrible, poor workmanship had to hire another company to fix their installation. Always had to fight with this company and could not get anywhere. Buyer or user beware! There are a lot better companies out there.

originalText.text: KingFreeze has done a good shop of taking care of our last minute requests.  Their technicians are knowledgeable and have helped on numerous occasions.
